properties.entry: Type the class name you want to search. any part of FQCN is acceptable.
You can search the jar file that contains the class name you specified.
You can search the jar file that contains the class name by accessing http://www.jarfinder.com/
Clear the contents of this window.
Here you can see the list of jar file(s) that contains specified class.
You can see the contents of jar file containing specified class.
Next time don't show this dialog and directly opens the browser.
You can see the result of searching the class at http://www.jarfinder.com/
